name: Drone Scheduled Service Inspection Checklist
description: Scheduled service and maintenance inspection checklist for drone systems

tasks.title: MAINTENANCE: Scheduled component replacement
tasks.description:
Replace time-limited components according to maintenance schedule.

Replace propellers if at hour limit.
Change dampeners and vibration isolators.
Replace battery if at cycle limit.
Update expired safety equipment.
Replace worn cable ties and protective sleeves.
instructions: Check maintenance schedule for due replacements

tasks.title: LUBRICATION: Apply lubrication and protective coatings
tasks.description:
Perform all lubrication and protection services.

Lubricate gimbal bearings if applicable.
Apply dielectric grease to electrical connections.
Lubricate folding propeller mechanisms.
Apply corrosion protection to exposed metal.
Clean and lubricate mechanical linkages.

tasks.title: SOFTWARE: Firmware and software updates
tasks.description:
Update all firmware and software to latest stable versions.

Update flight controller firmware.
Update ESC firmware if available.
Update companion computer software.
Update ground station software.
Verify parameter file after updates.
Test all functions after updates.

tasks.title: CLEANING: Deep cleaning and inspection
tasks.description:
Perform thorough cleaning of all components.

Clean all optical sensors and lenses.
Remove dust and debris from motors.
Clean cooling fins and heat sinks.
Clean electrical contacts and connectors.
Remove any corrosion or oxidation.
Clean and inspect propellers thoroughly.
instructions: Clean all camera lenses and sensors
Blow out motors with compressed air

tasks.title: COMPLIANCE: Regulatory compliance and documentation
tasks.description:
Ensure all regulatory compliance requirements are met.

Verify registration is current.
Check insurance documentation.
Update maintenance logbook.
Verify pilot certifications are current.
Ensure all required markings are legible.
File any required service bulletins.
